name: Harvest Hoppers
description:
Harvest Hoppers is a fun casual game for two players, where you play as cute pets - Cat and Rabbit that help their owners to manage the garden. The art style of the game is turned to the very roots of Ukrainian culture - to embroidery and shows the life of a rural Ukrainian family in a traditional environment.

The game was created for the Global Game Jam 2023.
#Kazoog #Year of the Rabbit #Couch Potato #An Image Is Worth 1,000 Words

Controls:
WASD + E - Cat's movement + action.
Arrow keys + Shift - Rabbit's movement + action.
You will also need a mouse to interact with menus.
